record.title: MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--H.R. 493

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, H.R. 493 has been received from the House and is at the desk and due for its first reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask for a second reading but object to my own request.
